1125680.name: Percy Lancaster Demo
1125680.description:
This game made in 3D graphics with a side view combines the atmosphere of old platform games with more modern graphics. I'm working on the game, inspired by the old, very first "Prince of Persia" for DOS, as well as by the wonderful "Fez".

The action takes place mainly underground at different levels. And in the final part the events are transferred to the surface of the planet and into space.

The main character still does not know how to jump and to swim, but I will definitely teach him. Stay tuned!

This is a browser-based 3D game that will be supplied as a build for Windows on Webkit. In theory it also can work in any browser that supports WebGL in any operating system - Windows, iOs, MacOS, Android, Linux and so on. But for now you can get the game as Windows 7-8-10 installation package.
1125680.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
